imdb.plot outline: On the outside, Finley is a bright red fire engine. On the inside he's a kid at heart, full of curiosity, good will, and generosity. He embodies that special age of wonder where everything is new--a character that children can relate and respond to. Just one of the many trucks and cars who come to life in the town of Friendlyville, Finley lives at Fire Station #5 with Captain Parker, the Grandfather of all fire engines, Scout the Firehouse Dog, Polly the Stationhouse Pole, and the alarming Mr. Bell. Also dedicated to serving the community in their own unique ways are Gorby the Garbage Truck, Miguel the Mail Truck, Scooty the School Bus, DJ the Bulldozer, Jesse the Tow Truck, Isabelle the Ice Cream Truck, and Dexter the Dump Truck. Stressing simple, visually captivating storytelling that entertains, and nurtures the imagination and the senses, Finley the Fire Engine covers such developmental themes as being kind, responsible, and truthful, how to build self-esteem, and the joy of discovering the benefits of sharing and being a good friend. It also covers such issues as sibling rivalry, illnesses, the care of pets, safety during playtime and sports, making mistakes and solving them, compassion for those that are different, peer pressure, teamwork, the importance of physical fitness, and so much more.
imdb.title: Finley the Fire Engine
plot: _Finley the Fire Engine_ (qv) and his friends get up to all kinds of advertures in Friendlyville

On the outside, Finley is a bright red fire engine. On the inside he's a kid at heart, full of curiosity, good will, and generosity. He embodies that special age of wonder where everything is new--a character that children can relate and respond to. Just one of the many trucks and cars who come to life in the town of Friendlyville, Finley lives at Fire Station #5 with Captain Parker, the Grandfather of all fire engines, Scout the Firehouse Dog, Polly the Stationhouse Pole, and the alarming Mr. Bell. Also dedicated to serving the community in their own unique ways are Gorby the Garbage Truck, Miguel the Mail Truck, Scooty the School Bus, DJ the Bulldozer, Jesse the Tow Truck, Isabelle the Ice Cream Truck, and Dexter the Dump Truck. Stressing simple, visually captivating storytelling that entertains, and nurtures the imagination and the senses, _Finley the Fire Engine_ (qv) covers such developmental themes as being kind, responsible, and truthful, how to build self-esteem, and the joy of discovering the benefits of sharing and being a good friend. It also covers such issues as sibling rivalry, illnesses, the care of pets, safety during playtime and sports, making mistakes and solving them, compassion for those that are different, peer pressure, teamwork, the importance of physical fitness, and so much more.
